name: The Ritz-Carlton Kyoto
description: Luxury hotel along the Kamogawa River blending modern comfort with traditional Japanese aesthetics. Features onsen baths, kaiseki dining, and impeccable service.

name: Canaves Oia Suites
description: Stunning cave suites carved into the cliffs of Oia with private plunge pools and caldera views. Ultimate romantic luxury experience in Santorini.

name: Ion Adventure Hotel
description: Modern design hotel in the Icelandic countryside with Northern Lights viewing, geothermal spa, and adventure activities. Eco-friendly and stylish.

name: Riad Yasmine
description: Traditional Moroccan riad in the heart of the medina with rooftop terrace, courtyard pool, and authentic decor. Peaceful oasis near all attractions.

name: Fairmont Chateau Lake Louise
description: Iconic castle-like hotel directly on Lake Louise with mountain views, fine dining, and year-round activities. Perfect base for exploring the Rockies.
